text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 53 in today's
episode I have an idiom for you keep at
bay let's find out what it means and how
you can use it in your daily
conversation to keep at bay sometimes
you realize that certain things or some
people don't make you comfortable it can
be due to various reasons to avoid any
conflict or unpleasantness you better
choose to stay away from such things or
people to keep at bay basically means to
keep a safe distance from someone or
something it also means to prevent
something or someone from coming too
near to you or harming you which could
be anything a person a situation or even
a problem so when you keep something or
someone at bay you are handling the
situation more tactfully without getting
into any unnecessary mess or a problem
actually you very smartly choose to stay
away by keeping things at bay for
example when you are on a weight loss
program you keep yummy deserts at bay as
they go against your goal of losing
weight okay
now that you know what keeping things at
bay mean let's take a look at some
example sentences to see how you can use
it in your daily conversation
example one whenever tina is out she
keeps her husband's credit cards at bay
as she can't resist shopping example to
a daily dose of vitamin c keeps cough
and cold at bay there is also an old
saying an apple a day keeps the doctor
at bay example three to keep the
unwanted telemarketing calls at bay john
registered his telephone number in the
do not disturb directory example for
practicing yoga and meditation are good
ways to keep stress at bay example five
keeping huge liabilities at bay is a
hassle-free way of running your business
as there is less burden of outstandings
example 6 when you are working on the
computer for long hours doing stretches
at regular intervals keeps back and neck
problems at bay as they help in relaxing
your muscles example 7 the nutritionist
told Janet to fight obesity keep junk
food at bay and stock your fridge with
vegetables and fruits
example 8 the star couple agreed for an
interview with the media after the media
promise to keep questions regarding
their wedding at bay
example 9 due to a serious leg sprain
Rosie had to keep her high heels at bay
to avoid any further damage example 10
William missed his girlfriend so much
that he couldn't keep her thoughts at
bay and flew down immediately to see her
example 11 to keep spam emails at bay I
installed an email filtering software in
my laptop that's the end of today's
episode have you ever kept anything at
bay if you have kindly share your
comments below this video explaining how
you kept things at bay thank you for
watching this video subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the

video vocabulary till then bye and take
care
you
